questions.question: What are the primary goals that need to be achieved for the campaign to be considered complete?
Are there any specific milestones or events that signal the approaching end of the campaign?
options: The discovery of the final dungeon
A significant betrayal by an NPC
The gathering of all magical items
The revelation of the antagonist's plan

questions.question: How flexible is the conclusion? Can it adapt to different player actions and decisions?
options: The conclusion is fixed and cannot be changed
The conclusion can adapt to player actions
Player decisions heavily influence the outcome

questions.question: How will major player decisions throughout the campaign influence the final outcome?
options: Determine the fate of the main antagonist
Affect the survival of key NPCs
Alter the state of the game world

questions.question: Are there any critical choices or turning points that will significantly alter the ending?
options: Choosing to ally with a powerful NPC
Deciding to spare or kill a major villain
Recovering or destroying a pivotal artifact
Completing or abandoning a major quest

questions.question: What long-term consequences will player actions have on the game world?
How will unresolved plot points be addressed in the final sessions?
options: Left as mysteries for future campaigns

questions.question: Are there any secondary storylines or character arcs that need closure?
options: Yes, they will be addressed in the epilogue
Some will be resolved, others will not
They will be resolved through side quests

questions.question: How will you handle unfinished side quests or personal goals of the players?
options: Allow players to complete them in the final sessions
Summarize the outcomes during the epilogue

questions.question: Will there be an epilogue to highlight the long-term effects of the players' actions?
options: No, the campaign ends with the final battle

questions.question: How will the final scene be structured to provide a satisfying conclusion?
options: A dramatic showdown with the main antagonist
A celebratory gathering of the heroes
A reflective moment for each character
A combination of action and reflection

questions.question: Will each player character have a moment to reflect on their journey and contributions?
options: No, the focus is on the main story

questions.question: Is there a plan for a direct sequel or a related campaign set in the same world?
How will the events of this campaign influence potential future adventures?
options: Creating lasting changes in the world

questions.question: Will there be recurring characters or locations in the follow-up campaign?
options: No, entirely new characters and locations

questions.question: Will there be an opportunity for players to continue exploring the world after the main plot concludes?
How will you handle character progression and rewards in a post-campaign setting?
Are there any additional challenges or adventures available for players who wish to continue?
How will you gather feedback from players about the campaign's conclusion?
Are there any debriefing sessions or discussions planned to reflect on the campaign?
options: No, feedback will be gathered separately

questions.question: How will player feedback influence future campaign planning and development?
Will there be any special mechanics for the final battle or climactic encounters?
options: Yes, unique rules for the final battle
Yes, special abilities for the antagonist

questions.question: How will you handle any final level-ups or character advancements?
options: Allow level-ups before the final battle
Grant special abilities for the final encounter

questions.question: Are there any specific rules for resolving the final conflicts or achieving the campaign's goals?
options: Yes, custom rules for the finale
